# signum()

**Instance Method**

Returns `-1` if this value is negative and `1` if it’s positive; otherwise, `0`.

## Declaration

```swift
func signum() -> Self
```

## Return Value

The sign of this number, expressed as an integer of the same type.
title: signum()
